name: foundry-dod
description: A Foundry VTT system for the Deck of Destiny RPG.
author: elsarfhem, W1zZo

scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:packs:db
scripts.build:packs:src: fvtt package workon dod --type System && fvtt package unpack --inputDirectory packs --outputDirectory src/packs/cards -n cards && fvtt package unpack --inputDirectory packs --outputDirectory src/packs/macros -n macros
scripts.build:packs:db: fvtt package workon dod --type System && fvtt package pack --inputDirectory src/packs/cards --outputDirectory packs -n cards -t Cards && fvtt package pack --inputDirectory src/packs/macros --outputDirectory packs -n macros -t Macro && fvtt package pack --inputDirectory src/packs/journals --outputDirectory packs -n journals -t JournalEntry
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) { console.log('Skipped husky installation') }"
